input.text: Hi. Spiky here. In this video, I'm going to show you how to install the Engine X Proxy Manager n your own homelab as a Docker container. We are going to use our freshly installed Ubuntu Desktop Virtual Machine for this. You can watch the above video on how to install your Ubuntu Virtual Machine in Proxmox if you don't allready have one installed. In this video we will only focus on installing the Proxy Manager. Let's go!
